name: Notion Investor CRM Copy Test
description: Testing copy variants (Organization vs. Relationship Focus) for the Notion Investor CRM to optimize sales.

copy.subtitle: A powerful Notion CRM to track investors, conversations, and deal status in one organized place.
copy.whatsInItForMe: This template ends the chaos of managing investor relations in spreadsheets, so you never miss a follow-up or lose a key contact.
copy.target_audience: Founders and startups actively managing investor relations or raising capital.
copy.pain_point: Tracking investor conversations across spreadsheets, emails, and notes is chaotic and leads to missed opportunities.
copy.solution: Our Notion CRM centralizes all investor data, conversations, and statuses into a single, easy-to-manage dashboard.

copy.subtitle: The essential Notion CRM for building stronger investor relationships and closing your next round faster.
copy.whatsInItForMe: By systematically managing your relationships, you build the trust and momentum needed to get to a 'yes' faster.
copy.target_audience: Startups focused on building strong, long-term relationships with their investors.
copy.pain_point: Failing to properly nurture investor relationships leads to cold leads and a stalled fundraising process.
copy.solution: This CRM is designed to help you manage and nurture investor relationships effectively, turning contacts into commitments.
